Welcome to NDS-Shop!

Here you can find lists of NDS Games, updated regularly to make sure you’re getting the latest versions. Click on the links in the navigation bar at the top to get full lists, or check out some of the most recently updated at the bottom of this page!

Most information on this site is automatically gathered from the information on the app’s GitHub repository, however if you notice any incorrect information please report it on our Discord server. Thanks!

This is also the default UniStore for Universal-Updater, so if you’d like to browse and install apps from Universal-DB directly on your 3DS you should give it a try.

Last updated:

Nazi Zombies: Portable

NZ:P Team & masterfeizz – 359 ☆

Call of Duty: Zombies demake, powered by various Quake sourceports. https://docs.nzp.gay/
System: 3DS
Version: nightly
Last updated: 2024-08-05

open_agb_firm

profi200 – 885 ☆

open_agb_firm is a bare metal app for running GBA homebrew/games using the 3DS builtin GBA hardware.
System: 3DS
Version: beta_2024-07-30
Last updated: 2024-07-30

uxnds

Adrian Siekierka – 147 ☆

NDS/3DS fork/port of the uxn/Varvara virtual machine
System: 3DS, DS
Version: v0.5.2
Last updated: 2024-07-26

Artic Base Server

PabloMK7 – 339 ☆

A tool for broadcasting games from your console to a compatible 3DS emulator.
System: 3DS
Version: v1.2.0
Last updated: 2024-07-16
